title: Super Bowl Opening Night recap
itunes:title: Super Bowl Opening Night recap
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Colleen Wolfe – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL, including reports out of Detroit that Calvin Johnson told the Lions he plans to retire, and the Browns announcing they will release quarterback Johnny Manziel on March 8th. Then, the heroes recap all the action from Super Bowl Opening Night before jumping into a rousing game of “What’s more likely?: Super Bowl 50 Edition.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
